title: How This Sophisticated Apartment Reno Honours Its Harbour Bridge Views
description: With envious views of the Sydney Harbour Bridge available to this 149-square-metre apartment, but not totally harnessed, the team at Mr & Mrs Elias — who specialise in apartment renovations — undertook a complete redesign to make them the focal point. True to the client’s brief, the home now feels spacious, comfortable and functional — with a splash of luxury — proving downsizing doesn’t have to come with compromises. Take a tour below!
author: The Design Files
